detail_desc: Round-necked cardigan in soft, fine-knit, printed cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Longer-style top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline and short puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top and short flounced sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short, wide top in printed jersey with short sleeves.
Fully-fashioned trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.

Short, A-line dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Long puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. V-neck underdress in jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow shoulder straps.
Oversized, straight-cut T-shirt in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Set with a T-shirt and pair of leggings in printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trainer socks in a fast-drying, functional fine knit with elastication at the top and silicone on the inside of the heels for a better fit.

Playsuit in airy, crinkled chiffon with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck. Concealed elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with two flounces at the cuffs. Lined.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric. High waist with wide elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and tapered legs. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a grandad collar with a visible button. Concealed buttons down the front, a flounced button band, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles and a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x39x48 cm.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Treggings in stretch twill with fake front pockets and real back pockets.Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Cardigan in a soft lace knit with dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No buttons.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round, ribbed neckline.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) toe caps and soles.
Boxy, knitted jumper with a polo neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Trainers in canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles. Platform 3 cm.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a covered elasticated waistband. Lined.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication at the back of the waist and ties at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and one inner pocket. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, a tapered chest, and sharply tapered waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and ventilating mesh panels at the sides. 67% of the polyester is recycled.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbing at the cuffs.
Sleeveless playsuit in lace with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats, a concealed zip in one side, and wide legs. Jersey lining.
Shirt in soft, gently draping viscose twill with contrasting colour seams. Collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with double shoulder straps and a metal fastener at the back.
Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the hem, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a metal fastener at the back.
Fleece-lined, patterned wellingtons with removable fleece insoles, a loop at the back and chunky soles.
Sleeveless dress in a patterned cotton weave with concealed press-studs at the back. Seam and a sewn-on bow at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal side pockets and short legs.
Short, boxy-style cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Metal rings in various designs.
Two-strand hairband with braids in imitation suede and elastic at the back.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-shaped opening at the front and long, wide sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck with decorative gathers. Tie-top shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Double layer at the top. Unlined.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, front pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Hoop earrings in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in superstretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.

Trousers in sturdy twill made from a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and decorative button, and tapered legs.
Treggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft stretch denim with an elasticated drawstring waist and fly with a press-stud.
Large metal earrings with tear-shaped plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 7 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Elastication and a frill trim at the top and hem.
Tights in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with soft terry inside.
Wide headband knitted in an alpaca blend.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This cosy hoodie is made from heavy, 460 gsm cotton sweatshirt fabric for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a double-layered, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide-fitting, V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a large hood and long sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and slim legs with ribbed hems.
Towel in soft cotton terry in the shape of a poncho with a hood at the top and ties at the sides.
